query:
SELECT 
  ii.id as inspection_item_id,
  e.name as environment_name,
  ist.id as step_id,
  ist.step_order,
  ist.step_name
FROM inspection_items ii
JOIN environments e ON ii.environment_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN installation_steps ist ON ii.id = ist.inspection_item_id
WHERE e.name = 'Piscina Coberta - Editado'
ORDER BY ist.step_order;
